lead_paragraph: The State Colonization Society held a meeting, last evening at the Rev. Dr. SPRING'S Church, the occasion the departure of over thirty colored persons to Liberia. They were present at the meeting, and intend to leave to-day, in the big Zeno. The number thirty-seven in all, and are recommended as an intelligent and worthy class.
